author: rgrabowski
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-123. Process, User, and System level Environment variables (EnvironmentVariableTarget) are now recognized in EnvironmentPatternConverter under .NET 2.0. Patch submitted by Richard J Foster.

author: rgrabowski
msg: Removed virtual marker on Format(LoggingEvent) method to indicate implementors should focus on the Format(TextWriter, LoggingEvent).

author: felixk
msg: Moving duplicated code of *-help plugins at one place. Introducing for this a helper pom which is referenced via relative path.

author: sebor
msg: * bin/xcomp.awk: Added a pattern to extract date formatted in the
(get_date): Handled badly formatted/empty dates more robustly.
(get_buildtype): Handled build types with the [redundant] "win32" bit
(print_section): Stripped the leading directory component from the log
